name: PACO! PACO!
description:
This is our game for Quarantine Jam hosted by LebGameDev.

You have to help Paco pack is van and then make his deliveries. I teamed up with my friends Ryan Tranter (Graphics) and Ben Sidwell (Music) and came up with this idea together. They have been great throughout this and we produced this!!

Had a great time developing this with them and the great ideas they came up with to develop something that I could not of on my own!

Controls:

mouse and left click to drop parcels in to the van

arrow keys or WASD to drive the van and mouse and left click to fire parcels

Hope you like it!!
